title: Representative-Based Tennis Training Task Design Strategy

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental physical education theory and comprehension of basic tennis skills
context.additional_context: A course where pre-service teachers learn to design tennis training tasks simulating real-game situations, combining online theoretical learning with offline practical workshops

learning_goals: Learners can design three or more tennis training tasks reflecting actual game characteristics
Learners can analyze the representativeness of training tasks based on the RPAT (Representative Practice Assessment Tool) evaluation criteria
Learners can revise training tasks based on interpretations of three-dimensional motion data
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
